title: New Death Stranding Tidbits and Questions - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.22.19
description:
Go to http://Brooklinen.com and use promo code GAMES for 10% off AND free shipping.

Boost is only available at http://Experian.com/kfgames.

Tim and Greg go over Kojima's Comic-Con news!

Time Stamps - 
00:01:00 - Housekeeping
Greg’s 100th Plat: Today @ 4 pm PT - The Division 2
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Colton Yoder, Black Jack, and Mohammed Mohammed
Today, we’re brought to you by Brooklinen and Experian, but I’ll tell you about that later.
The Roper Report   -
00:03:35 - Death Stranding Tidbits
00:13:52 - “Will the Video Game industry's fascination with hollywood actors ever end?” - The Nano Biologist
00:25:01 - Stadia Tidbits
00:27:20 - Get Your Witcher Boners Ready
00:29:44 - Former StarCraft 2 Pro, Commentator Geoff 'iNcontroL' Robinson Dies
00:30:43 - “This isn't so much as a question…” - Evan M
00:31:25 - EVO 2019 Finals Order
00:33:10 - Out today
00:34:02 -  Experian
00:35:28 - Brooklinen
Reader mail   -
00:37:04 - “I was wondering why doesn't DC license their IP's to more developers…” - Fendyy
00:48:35 - “Marvel Ultimate Alliance is off to a hot start after this weekend…” - Krajookee
00:53:03 - “Wolfenstein: Youngblood comes out this Friday and where is all the promotional material and marketing?” - Constantine
00:56:28 - “Greg, this weekend was your first Pokémon GO community day...” - 2038 Pokemon CEO
00:58:58 - Squad Up: BigFren - Pokemon GO - 5617-5135-1742
00:59:52 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg & Andrea
